description: Tata Power, Zoomcar partner to expand EV charging network. Tata Power’s EZ Charge infrastructure to add 25,000 charging points in 5 yrs. Zoomcar to turn 50% of fleet into EVs by 2025. #TataPower #Zoomcar #EVCharging #MoU #RFID
